entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening and ending overnight. Clearing before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
